results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(r,c) = 2*r*c + l + c (1 <= c <= l).
comment: T(r,c) gives number of edges (of unit length) in a c X r grid.
The values 2*T(r,c)+1 = (2*r+1)*(2*c+1) are nonprime and therefore in A047845.
